message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I'm willing to sell it to you for $120. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love it.
I'm really interested in the product, but $120 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?

Hi Bob, I understand that $120 might be a bit steep for you, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle. I can sell it to you for $110. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but $110 is still a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $85. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?

Hi Bob, I understand that $110 was still a bit high for you, but I'm willing to make another concession. I can sell it to you for $100. It's the lowest price I'm willing to accept, but I think it's still a great deal for you.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
